system.description:
Requirements: you must have mastered the Illusionist Class.

You learn the ultimate Illusionist spell: Create Phantasm: Numen.

Create Phantasm: NumenMP: 50Target: SpecialDuration: Instantaneous

You can now have up to four active Phantasms, but one of them must necessarily be Numen.
You cannot have more than one Numen Phantasm active at a time.

This Phantasm cannot be used in any of the Illusionist's Skills or Spells.

  • Numen is bound by the same set of special rules as any other Phantasm, with the following exceptions:

  • Numen's Phantasmal Vitality equals twice your base INS die size plus your level.

Once active, Numen has its own turn and a single action. It does not benefit from Spells that grant additional actions. Numen’s turn can be taken either before or after the Illusionist’s turn.

When creating a Numen Phantasm, choose one essence, which dictates Numen's Damage Type:

  • Ravana: Physical @ICON[physical]

  • Asura: Light @ICON[light]

  • Diablos: Dark @ICON[dark]

The range of the attack is determined by your current weapon. The target hit by Numen suffers 【HR + 14】 damage. This amount increases to 18 if you are level 20 or higher, or to 20 if you are level 40 or higher.

Damage dealt by Numen ignores Resistances and Immunities.
